page.title: 15Churches:Chinnor etc (cont)
page.content: A Congregational Church and a Methodist Chapel still thrive. Villagers of various denominations organise a joint Christian Aid Week in June of each year when many fund-raising events are arranged. Most people in Chinnor, including school children, take part and it is always most successful with its Concert, Hunger Lunch, Fete, and Christian Aid Walk etc. Church services at Christmas and Easter are well attended. In fact, churches in Chinnor add much to the community life of the village.
